description: As a software engineer from Chicago with a background in film & video and hospitality, I bring a unique set of skills to the table. My diverse experiences have provided me with a well-rounded understanding of the development process, while also enabling me to maintain a client-focused approach. I excel in product management, sales, marketing, and personalized customer support, and leverage these skills to drive results and exceed expectations. I am deeply committed to delivering exceptional user experiences and am fueled by my passion for innovation. With a proven track record of success and a dedication to achieving excellence in all of my endeavors, I am confident in my ability to make a meaningful contribution to any team.
